name: Building Design & Construction Magazine
description: Building Design & Construction Magazine is a monthly broadcast and online magazine that covers all aspects of the UK &European construction industry. Established over 8 years ago, BDC Magazine has become one of the leading trade publications in the industry. Built upon strong foundations of quality, informed journalism, sleek and contemporary design, up-to-date news, interviews with the trade’s top professionals/companies and in-depth case studies of projects which challenge convention and extend boundaries. Whatever area of the industry you work in, the key to maximising the response to your advertising budget is by using the right publication that targets the decision makers you want to make contact with, whether it’s contractors, civil engineers, architects, developers or end-users. Main contractors learn about new or innovative products mainly through trade journals. We make it our business to help and promote your business.
